GET Response : url=http://localhost:8000/api/operations/logs status=200, reason=OK headers={'date': 'Fri, 21 Feb 2025 06:44:40 GMT', 'server': 'uvicorn', 'content-length': '3347', 'content-type': 'application/json'} body=["[2025-02-21 14:44:39] [INFO] - GET /api/operations/health - 200 - 0.00s
","[2025-02-21 14:43:39] [INFO] - GET /api/operations/logs - 200 - 0.00s
","[2025-02-21 14:43:36] [INFO] - GET /api/operations/logs - 200 - 0.01s
","[2025-02-21 14:38:40] [INFO] - POST /api/recipes/suggest - 200 - 7.75s
","[2025-02-21 14:38:40] [INFO] - Recipes suggested: [Recipe(name='Scrambled Eggs', description='A quick and easy breakfast dish made by scrambling eggs in butter until fluffy and creamy.', ingredients=['2 eggs', '1 tablespoon butter', 'Salt', 'Pepper'], steps=['In a bowl, crack the eggs and whisk them together until fully mixed.', 'In a non-stick skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.', 'Once the butter is melted and bubbling, pour in the whisked eggs.', 'Let the eggs sit for a few moments, then gently stir with a spatula, pushing the eggs from the edges toward the center.', 'Continue to cook, stirring occasionally, until the eggs are softly set but still slightly runny (they will continue to cook off the heat).', 'Season with salt and pepper, serve immediately.']), Recipe(name='Egg and Butter Sandwich', description='A simple yet delicious sandwich made with buttered toast and a fried egg.', ingredients=['1 egg', '2 slices of bread', '1 tablespoon butter', 'Salt', 'Pepper'], steps=['Heat a skillet over medium heat and add the butter, allowing it to melt.', 'Crack the egg into the skillet and cook to your desired doneness (sunny side up, over easy, etc.).', 'While the egg is cooking, toast the slices of bread in a toaster or the skillet until golden brown.', 'Spread additional butter on one side of the toasted bread if desired.', 'Once the egg is done, place it on the toasted bread, season with salt and pepper, and top with the second slice of bread.', 'Cut in half and serve warm.'])]
","[2025-02-21 14:38:32] [INFO] - Request received with ingredients: ['egg', 'butter']
","[2025-02-21 14:38:28] [INFO] - GET /api/operations/health - 200 - 0.00s
","[2025-02-21 14:37:42] [INFO] - POST /api/recipes/suggest - 422 - 0.00s
","[2025-02-21 14:37:40] [INFO] - POST /api/recipes/suggest - 200 - 5.92s
","[2025-02-21 14:37:40] [INFO] - Recipes suggested: [Recipe(name='Scrambled Eggs with Butter', description='Creamy and rich scrambled eggs made with butter for a delicious breakfast.', ingredients=['2 eggs', '2 tablespoons butter'], steps=['In a bowl, crack the eggs and whisk them until well combined.', 'In a non-stick skillet over medium heat, melt the butter until it starts to foam.', 'Pour the beaten eggs into the skillet.', 'Stir gently with a spatula, folding the eggs from the edges to the center.', 'Cook until the eggs are softly set and creamy, about 3-4 minutes.', 'Remove from heat and serve immediately.']), Recipe(name='Egg and Butter Frittata', description='A simple frittata made with eggs and a generous amount of butter, perfect for a light meal.', ingredients=['2 eggs', '2 tablespoons butter'], steps=['Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).', 'In a bowl, whisk the eggs until frothy.', 'In an oven-safe skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.', 'Pour the whisked eggs into the skillet and allow to cook for about 2 minutes without stirring.', 'Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the eggs are set.', 'Remove from oven, slice, and serve warm.'])]
"]

POST Response : url=http://localhost:8000/api/recipes/suggest status=200, reason=OK headers={'date': 'Fri, 21 Feb 2025 06:44:44 GMT', 'server': 'uvicorn', 'content-length': '1177', 'content-type': 'application/json'} body=[{"name":"Scrambled Eggs","description":"A quick and easy dish made with beaten eggs cooked in butter until fluffy.","ingredients":["2 eggs","1 tablespoon butter","Salt","Pepper"],"steps":["Crack the eggs into a bowl and beat them with a fork until mixed.","Heat butter in a non-stick skillet over medium heat until melted.","Pour in the beaten eggs and season with salt and pepper.","Gently stir with a spatula, pushing the eggs from the edges to the center.","Cook until the eggs are set but still slightly runny (about 3-5 minutes).","Remove from heat and serve immediately."]},{"name":"Butter Omelette","description":"A simple omelette made with eggs and butter, perfect for any breakfast.","ingredients":["2 eggs","1 tablespoon butter","Salt","Pepper"],"steps":["Crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk until well blended.","Heat butter in a non-stick skillet over medium heat until melted and bubbling.","Pour the eggs into the skillet and tilt to spread evenly.","Cook until the edges begin to set (about 2-3 minutes).","Gently lift the edges of the omelette and let the uncooked egg flow underneath.","Once cooked through, season with salt and pepper, fold, and serve."]}]

kw.msg: [{'name': 'Scrambled Eggs', 'description': 'A quick and easy dish made with beaten eggs cooked in butter until fluffy.', 'ingredients': ['2 eggs', '1 tablespoon butter', 'Salt', 'Pepper'], 'steps': ['Crack the eggs into a bowl and beat them with a fork until mixed.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick skillet over medium heat until melted.', 'Pour in the beaten eggs and season with salt and pepper.', 'Gently stir with a spatula, pushing the eggs from the edges to the center.', 'Cook until the eggs are set but still slightly runny (about 3-5 minutes).', 'Remove from heat and serve immediately.']}, {'name': 'Butter Omelette', 'description': 'A simple omelette made with eggs and butter, perfect for any breakfast.', 'ingredients': ['2 eggs', '1 tablespoon butter', 'Salt', 'Pepper'], 'steps': ['Crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk until well blended.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick skillet over medium heat until melted and bubbling.', 'Pour the eggs into the skillet and tilt to spread evenly.', 'Cook until the edges begin to set (about 2-3 minutes).', 'Gently lift the edges of the omelette and let the uncooked egg flow underneath.', 'Once cooked through, season with salt and pepper, fold, and serve.']}]

kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:8000/api/recipes/suggest path_url=/api/recipes/suggest headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'accept': 'application/json', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '51'} body=b'{"ingredients": ["egg", "egg", "butter", "butter"]}'

POST Response : url=http://localhost:8000/api/recipes/suggest status=200, reason=OK headers={'date': 'Fri, 21 Feb 2025 06:45:04 GMT', 'server': 'uvicorn', 'content-length': '584', 'content-type': 'application/json'} body=[{"name":"Butter and Egg Scramble","description":"A quick and delicious scrambled eggs dish made with buttery goodness.","ingredients":["2 eggs","2 tablespoons butter","Salt to taste","Pepper to taste"],"steps":["In a bowl, crack the eggs and whisk them until well blended.","In a non-stick skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.","Pour the whisked eggs into the skillet.","Allow the eggs to sit for a few seconds, then gently stir with a spatula.","Continue to cook until the eggs are softly set but still slightly runny.","Season with salt and pepper, then remove from heat."]}]
